predicate.note: Frames file for 'implement' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison.

roleset.name: bring about

example.name: active
example.text: The results underscore Sears-1' difficulties in *trace*-1 implementing the ``everyday low pricing'' strategy that it adopted in March as part of a broad attempt to revive its retailing business.
example.arg: the ``everyday low pricing'' strategy that it adopted in March as part of a broad attempt to revive its retailing business

example.name: passive
example.text: All arguments against program trading, even those pressed without fact, conclude with three expected results after ``reforms-1'' are implemented *trace*-1: [etc]

roleset.note: subject traces seem unusually tricky for this verb. Dunno why.
